title: SIMCardAction
description: This object represents a SIM card action. It allows tracking the current status of an operation that impacts the SIM card.

action_type.description:
The operation type. It can be one of the following:
  • enable - move the SIM card to the enabled status
  • enable_standby_sim_card - move a SIM card previously on the standby status to the enabled status after it consumes data.
  • disable - move the SIM card to the disabled status
  • set_standby - move the SIM card to the standby status

value.description: The current status of the SIM card action.

reason.description: It describes why the SIM card action is in the current status. This will be null for self-explanatory statuses, such as in-progress and completed but will include further information on statuses like interrupted and failed.

settings.description: A JSON object representation of the action params.
